text: The 1990 Munster Senior Hurling Championship Final was a hurling match played on Sunday 15 July 1990 at Semple Stadium. It was contested by Cork and Tipperary. Cork captained by Kieran McGuckin claimed the title beating defending champions Tipperary on a scoreline of 4–16 to 2–14. ==References== ==External links== *Match Video *Official Programme Cover Munster Category:Munster Senior Hurling Championship Finals Category:Tipperary GAA matches Category:Cork senior hurling team matches
title: 1990 Munster Senior Hurling Championship Final
